classBarbarian.name: Barbarian
classBarbarian.description: A fiere warrior of primitive background who can always rise to the chance of battle

classBard.name: Bard
classBard.description: An aspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation

classCleric.name: Cleric
classCleric.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power

classDruid.name: Druid
classDruid.description: A priest of the Old Faith, weilding the power of nature --moonlight, plant growth, fire and lighting -- and adopting animal forms

classRogue.name: Rogue
classRogue.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies

classSorcerer.name: Sorcerer
classSorcerer.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline

classWarlock.name: Warlock
classWarlock.description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity

classWizard.name: Wizard
classWizard.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality
